TITLE Chicken Avocado Burgers

# In a large bowl combine: {[1 lbs ground chicken] [1 tsp [minced] garlic] [1 tbl shallot] [1/3 cup oatmeal] [1 item [minced] Jalapeno] [1/4 cup [chopped] cilantro] [1/2 tsp salt] [1/4 tsp pepper]}
# Fold in [1 item [large dice] avocado].
# Form into 4 patties.
# Griddle. 

* Optional Sauce
# In a small bowl stir together [3/4 cup yogurt], [1/4 tsp salt], [1 tbl chipotle].
